summary: Project now includes a full ICP canister template app (Motoko backend + React/Vite frontend with shadcn/ui, Internet Identity auth hooks, and build/deploy tooling) alongside an expanded cleaning service marketing site that includes WhatsApp inquiry/booking CTAs, an online booking form that redirects to WhatsApp with a prefilled message, service areas and embedded Google Maps location sections, Google Review prompts/links, a service rate list (including an AI-style sofa price estimator), a UPI payment section with QR + deep link, and updated nav/logo variants.

existing_features.title: SEO meta tags for service landing page
existing_features.description: Adds/updates SEO-relevant meta tags (e.g., description and keywords) for the cleaning service landing page.

existing_features.title: Internet Identity authentication integration
existing_features.description: Adds frontend authentication support using Internet Identity, including login/logout flows and related hooks/utilities.

existing_features.title: ICP backend canister + typed frontend actor integration
existing_features.description: Includes a Motoko backend canister and generated/typed frontend bindings with actor initialization hooks for calling canister methods from the React app.

existing_features.title: shadcn/ui component system integrated into frontend
existing_features.description: Adds shadcn/ui component setup (components registry/config, Tailwind styling, and a library of UI primitives) to support building the frontend UI consistently.

existing_features.title: Build/deploy template tooling for ICP project
existing_features.description: Provides project-level build template configuration (Dockerfile, scripts, workspace/package configs, and deploy tooling) for repeatable builds and deployments.

existing_features.title: Client-side StorageClient utility for persisted app state
existing_features.description: Adds a frontend StorageClient utility to standardize reading/writing persisted client state (e.g., auth/session-related data) in a typed, reusable way.

existing_features.title: Sofa/AC cleaning service landing page UI
existing_features.description: Implements the cleaning service marketing/landing page UI in the React frontend (e.g., hero/branding sections and overall page layout), integrating the generated brand/hero images and the app shell.

existing_features.title: Update `frontend/src/components/LandingPage.tsx` to match the structure, layout, Tailwind classes, and user-facing copy from the provided HTML snippet: sticky top navbar with text-only brand ("MAGICAL SERVICE" + "Ahmedabad & Gandhinagar") and a phone CTA; add a hero section (blue background) with heading "Professional Cleaning Service", subheading "Trusted Experts in Ahmedabad & Gandhinagar", and a primary "WhatsApp Inquiry" button linking to `https://wa.me/918000262644`; then render the "Our Service Rates" section with an underlined title and four service-rate cards (Sofa/AC Jet/Mattress/Carpet-Chair) using the same rounded corners, borders, and hover translate/transition behavior as the snippet; then render the 3-item benefits strip with the same mobile border-top behavior; then render the UPI + review section with "Scan to Pay (UPI)", QR image URL exactly as provided, and "UPI ID: jrg7311@okicici"; keep the floating WhatsApp button at bottom-right linking to `https://wa.me/918000262644`.

Replace any FontAwesome `<i class="...">` icon usage implied by the provided HTML with the existing project icon approach (e.g., `lucide-react` and/or `react-icons` already used in `LandingPage.tsx`), while keeping the visual intent (phone icon, WhatsApp icon, sofa/snowflake/bed/rug-like icons, shield/bolt/wallet-like icons).

new_feature_requests.summary: Add WhatsApp CTAs across the landing page (floating button + inquiry links) and support prefilled WhatsApp booking messages from an online booking form.
Add location discovery content: embedded Google Maps iframe section and detailed service-area listings for Ahmedabad & Gandhinagar.
Add reputation/UGC sections: Google Review CTA section and a trust/reviews highlight section on the landing page.
Add pricing content: service rate list cards/sections and an interactive sofa cleaning price estimator (feet slider -> computed total).
Add payments section: UPI QR code display, UPI ID/payee details, and a direct UPI deep-link button for online payment.
Add/standardize branding elements: navbar logo integration (with fallback), and optional footer logo consistency.

architectural_notes: Project scaffold expanded to a full ICP template: Motoko backend canister and React/Vite frontend, with canister YAML configs and generated DID/type bindings.
Frontend authentication includes Internet Identity support with dedicated hooks/utilities and linting rules enforcing provider usage.
UI stack includes Tailwind + shadcn/ui with a broad set of prebuilt UI primitives added under frontend src/components/ui.
Repository now contains build-template tooling (Dockerfile, workspace configs, image resize/prune scripts, deploy script) to standardize build/deploy.

A standalone reusable ICP app template is maintained under build-template/ (Dockerfile, deploy tooling, backend/frontend canister YAMLs, ESLint rules, shadcn/ui primitives), mirroring the main project structure for standardized export/reuse.

Build-template packaging/export readiness improved: includes LICENSE/README, pnpm workspace/package configs, and icp.yaml/deploy tooling to support standardized reuse/export (e.g., via GitHub/ICP CLI workflows).
Frontend now includes a StorageClient utility to centralize and standardize client-side persisted state access (e.g., local/session storage) for hooks/utilities.
Frontend/build-template linting expanded with a dedicated ESLint rule to prevent using BigInt values in query keys (avoids caching/serialization pitfalls in query libraries).
Frontend now includes a dedicated LandingPage component and app wiring (App/main/index.html/css) to render the sofa/AC cleaning service landing page within the ICP React/Vite template.
Landing page includes multiple conversion CTAs using tel: and wa.me links, including a floating WhatsApp action button.
known_issues: Production publishing can fail due to invalid custom domain names; domain must be 5â€“50 characters and contain only letters, numbers, and hyphens (e.g., underscores/TLD-like strings rejected).

generatedImages.description: Uploaded/replacement variant of the service logo (128x128) added to generated assets.
Uploaded/replacement variant of the service logo (512x512) added to generated assets.

projectName: Update landing page UI to match provided MAGICAL SERVICE HTML layout
